context.client_situation: MUFG wants to increase revenue and increase bankers' knowledge
context.previous_work: Have done workshops but need more learning by doing

key_findings: Need to put into practice wallet sizing, role of MUFG banker, product knowledge, macro trends, knowing client and how macro affect them

objectives.primary_goal: To develop a training plan for CIB bankers in collaboration with MUFG. For the first meeting please keep it more exploratory
